metadataAttributes.Title: Managing Asthma, Allergies, Diabetes, and Seizures in School
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Welcome to School Health specialization: Managing Asthma, Anaphylaxis, Food Allergies, Diabetes, and Seizures in School course. In this course, you will learn about these common medical issues students face and how to best support students who suffer from them. We will also take a holistic look at how we can best support overall student health.
